remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. [Unicode 標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)給每個支援的指令碼中的每個字元的字碼指標 （數字）。The [Unicode Standard](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) assigns a code point (a number) to each character in every supported script. Unicode 轉換格式 (UTF) 是要編碼字碼指標的方法。A Unicode Transformation Format (UTF) is a way to encode that code point. [Unicode 標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)會使用下列 UTFs:The [Unicode Standard](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) uses the following UTFs: - Utf-8，用來將每個字碼指標表示成一連串的一到四個位元組。UTF-8, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to four bytes. - Utf-16，用來將每個字碼指標表示成一連串的一到兩個 16 位元整數。UTF-16, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to two 16-bit integers. - UTF-32，用來將每個字碼指標表示成 32 位元整數。UTF-32, which represents each code point as a 32-bit integer. 如需有關 UTFs 和所支援其他編碼，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的字元編碼](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 類別代表以 utf-16 編碼方式。The class represents a UTF-16 encoding. 編碼器可以使用任何位元組由大到小位元組順序 (最大顯著性位元組第一次) 或小小的位元組由小到大位元組順序 (最小顯著性位元組第一次)。The encoder can use either big endian byte order (most significant byte first) or little endian byte order (least significant byte first). 例如，（字碼指標 u+0041） 序列化為 Latin Capital Letter 如下 （以十六進位方式）：For example, the Latin Capital Letter A (code point U+0041) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal): - 由大到小的位元組順序： 00 00 00 41Big endian byte order: 00 00 00 41 - 一些位元組由小到大位元組順序： 41 00 00 00Little endian byte order: 41 00 00 00 它會儲存 Unicode 字元，使用特定的平台的原生的位元順序通常更有效率。It is generally more efficient to store Unicode characters using the native byte order of a particular platform. 比方說，最好使用位元組由小到大的位元組順序少位元組由小到大的平台，例如 Intel 的電腦上。For example, it is better to use the little endian byte order on little endian platforms, such as Intel computers. 類別會對應到 Windows 字碼頁 1200 （少位元組由小到大位元組順序） 和 1201 （位元組由大到小位元組順序）。The class transformation format or UTF. 如果執行個體已設定為提供 BOM，您可以呼叫來擷取方法; 否則方法會傳回空陣列。If the instance is configured to provide a BOM, you can retrieve it by calling the method; otherwise, the method returns an empty
